medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent right upper quadrant pain accompanied by testicular pressure.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a several month history of intermittent RUQ pain, accompanied by chills, hot/cold flashes, and nausea/vomiting. The pain typically resolves without sequelae. Additionally, he has endorsed some intermittent diarrhea over the past few months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history not specified; past surgical history includes left shoulder surgery and repair of a skull fracture.
